name: addons
description: Addons securely sets your Addons.io env vars.

scripts.test: for f in tests/*; do echo "$f"; node "$f"; done; echo 'passed!'; exit 0

readme: # Node.js module for Addons.io Using this module you can dynamically download your sevice api keys from Addons.io ## Install Stop your node server if it is running. Run this in your terminal: ``` shell npm install addons ``` Add this to your javascript, server.js or otherwise: ``` javascript var addons = require('addons'); addons(); ``` Set environment variables and restart your server: ``` javascript ADDONS_API_ID='YOUR_ADDONS_API_ID_HERE' ADDONS_AUTH_TOKEN='YOUR_ADDONS_AUTH_TOKEN_HERE' node server.js ``` ## Heroku install Run this in your terminal when your Addons.io settings change (anytime addons.json is updated): ``` shell rake addons:heroku:push ``` Test App repo
